topic.domains: (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

title.ph: US Realm Header - Patient Generated Document (V2)

section.p:
This template is designed to be used in conjunction with the US Realm Header (V3). It includes additional conformances which further constrain the US Realm Header (V3).
The Patient Generated Document Header template is not a separate document type. The document body may contain any structured or unstructured content from C-CDA.

section.title: US Realm Header - Patient Generated Document (V2) Header Constraints
US Realm Header - Patient Generated Document (V2) Body Constraints

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-28458, CONF:1198-28459, CONF:1198-32917 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.29.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to US Realm Header2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1:2015-08-01)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget such that it (CONF:1198-28460)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:1198-28461)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-28462)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient such that it (CONF:1198-28465)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] guardian such that it (CONF:1198-28469)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:1198-28470)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28473)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] languageCommunication such that it (CONF:1198-28474)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] preferenceInd (CONF:1198-28475)
Note: Indicates a preference for information about care delivery and treatments be communicated (or translated if needed) into this language.
If more than one languageCommunication is present, only one languageCommunication element SHALL have a preferenceInd with a value of 1
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization, where its type is CDA Organization (CONF:1198-28476)
If present, this organization represents the provider organization where the person is claiming to be a patient.

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-28477)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor such that it (CONF:1198-28478)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-28479)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-28481)
When the author is a person who is not acting in the role of a clinician, this code encodes the personal or legal relationship between author and the patient.
When the author is a person who is not acting in the role of a clinician, this code encodes the personal or legal relationship between author and the patient.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer such that it (CONF:1198-28678)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-28679)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28680)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant such that it (CONF:1198-28681)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity such that it
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-28683), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28684)
if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity OR exactly one assignedEntity (CONF:1198-28682, DSTU:618)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian such that it (CONF:1198-28685)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian such that it (CONF:1198-28686)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization such that it (CONF:1198-28687)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-28688)
The combined @root and @extension attributes record the custodian organization's identity in a secure, trusted, and unique way.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:1198-28690)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] intendedRecipient such that it (CONF:1198-28691)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:1198-28692) such that it
The combined @root and @extension attributes to record the information recipient's identity in a secure, trusted, and unique way.
The combined @root and @extension attributes to record the information recipient's identity in a secure, trusted, and unique way.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator such that it (CONF:1198-28694)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-28695)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-28696)
The combined @root and @extension attributes to record the information recipient's identity in a secure, trusted, and unique way.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-28697)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator such that it (CONF:1198-28699)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-28700)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-28701)
The combined @root and @extension attributes to record the authenticator's identity in a secure, trusted, and unique way.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28702)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-28703)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:1198-28704)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-28705)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28706)
Unless otherwise specified by the document specific header constraints, when participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 INDRoleclassCodes STATIC 2011-09-30

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf such that it (CONF:1198-28707)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order such that it (CONF:1198-28708)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-28709)
A scheduled appointment or service event in a practice management system may be represented using this id element.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf such that it (CONF:1198-28710)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent such that it (CONF:1198-28711)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-28712)
The code should be selected from a value set established by the document-level template for a specific type of Patient Generated Document.
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1198-28713)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10901 STATIC (CONF:1198-28714)
The functionCode SHALL be selected from value set ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10901
When indicating the performer was the primary care physician the functionCode shall be ="PCP"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-28715)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-28716)
The combined @root and @extension attributes record the performer's identity in a secure, trusted, and unique way.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28718)
If the assignedEntity is an individual, the code SHOULD be selected from value set PersonalandLegalRelationshipRoleType value set

section.title: US Realm Header - Patient Generated Document (V2) Example

p.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 infrastructure/cda/CDA_SDTC.xsd"> <realmCode code="US"/> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.29.1" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1" extension="2015-08-01"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1944682624"/> <code code="2039844606"/> <title>org.openhealthtools.mdht.uml.cda.consol.impl. US Realm Header Patient Generated Document Impl</title> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.25" codeSystemName="ConfidentialityCode"/> <languageCode code="Code forlanguageCode"/> <setId root="MDHT" extension="1bf2e5e5-ab41-46a2-9007-446b4a471e5f"/> <versionNumber value="1"/> <recordTarget> <patientRole> <id root="MDHT" extension="176546862"/> <patient/> <providerOrganization/> </patientRole> </recordTarget> <author> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="1300792838"/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <dataEnterer> <assignedEntity> <id root="MDHT" extension="1504595107"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> </assignedEntity> </dataEnterer> <informant> <relatedEntity> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> </relatedEntity> </informant> <custodian> <assignedCustodian> <representedCustodianOrganization/> </assignedCustodian> </custodian> <informationRecipient> <intendedRecipient/> </informationRecipient> <legalAuthenticator> <time/> <signatureCode code="Code forsignatureCode"/> <assignedEntity> <id root="MDHT" extension="591874443"/> </assignedEntity> </legalAuthenticator> <authenticator> <time/> <signatureCode code="Code forsignatureCode"/> <assignedEntity> <id root="MDHT" extension="234923176"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> </assignedEntity> </authenticator> <participant> <associatedEntity> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> </associatedEntity> </participant> <inFulfillmentOf> <order> <id root="MDHT" extension="2058702228"/> </order> </inFulfillmentOf> <documentationOf> <serviceEvent> <code code="798406540"/> <performer> <functionCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.90" codeSystemName="HL7ParticipationType"/> </performer> </serviceEvent> </documentationOf> <component/> </ClinicalDocument>
